discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: {{GENDER:|fʋ}} na paam tiɛnr labaar saŋa kanɛ ka sɔ' zaŋ labapaal niŋ sɔnsʋg kaŋa ni. Fʋ tʋn'e maali fʋ tiɛnr labaar la zi'esim fʋ bɔɔdim pʋʋgin
discussiontoolsdebug-intro:
Zug lakir nwa pan'andnɛ [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DiscussionTools DiscussionTools extension]
la n baŋid pʋte'enra nɛ lɛbisa tisid zug lakir la ni '''[[:$1]]'''. Fʋ tɔn'ɛ nyee li sʋŋir yisibin yɛla nɛ tɔ'ɔŋir la bɛɛ gba'adi li gbin lin tʋm si'em. Laba kan na nɔɔ n bɛ [[$2|discussiontoolspageinfo API]] la ni.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Sɔnsig lakirin la]] anɛ zin'ikanɛ ka ti na ka nwɛ' taaba saawara ka li sʋŋ ka ti sɔb la  {{SITENAME}} an sʋ'ʋm wʋʋ din nar si'em la. Fʋ tun'e dɔlis lakirin nwa sɔns nɛ fʋ taaba yanamɛ na niŋ si'em ka ya sɔb la an sʋ'ʋŋa [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self:
Nidib banɛ bɛ {{SITENAME}} tɔn'ɛ tʋm nɛ' [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|talk page]] n 
kpɛn'ɛs labaar la paalʋ {{GENDER:|you}}, ka fʋ na paam ti'enr ba ya'a maal.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Ninbanɛ bɛ {{SITENAME}} tʋn'e zaŋ nɛ' tʋm[[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|talk page]] n zaŋ nidib labaar Kat wa'ae nɛ dɛmisʋg kanɛ maal yi IP adɛrɛsin la{{GENDER:| fʋ}} mɔri tʋm nannnana la.
Bɛdegʋ IP adɛrɛsnam tiakir nɛ saŋa wʋsa, ka nidib bɛdegʋ pʋdigidi li saŋa wʋsa. Fʋ tʋn'e [$1 maal akaʋnt ]bɛɛ[$2 kpɛn' ] ti gu' bɛog tuluŋ nɛ tʋmtʋm banɛ yiisi ba mɛŋ. Amaal akaʋnt mɛ sʋŋid su'adi fʋ IP adɛrɛs.
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: Pʋ'ʋsim tisidif fʋ pian'ʋk lakir zin'ig
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: Bɔ'ɔdif ken-ken sɔnsʋg lakir kaŋa ni
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Bɛllimnɛ maligim din'lɛm maki gɔs la
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id: lɛbisʋg nɛ li ID la ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}} la ni.
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name: lɛbisʋg nɛ li yʋ'ʋr tisib ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|zug lakir|pages}}: la ni.
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Zamisim pamm zaŋi kin zug lakir nwa.
discussiontools-limitreport-errorreqid: Sɔsʋg la'ad nam gbeligir bu'os ID
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: M bɛlim nɛ, bɔɔm yʋ'ʋri tis   {{GENDER:|your}} sɔsʋg pian'azug. Fʋ ya'a n di' "{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}",fʋ pian'azug na paas ka yʋ'ʋr pʋ paasɛ.
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-bu: Yisimi fʋ mɛŋ ka da paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paal ya'a pin'il zug lakir kaŋa ni.
Yisimi fʋ mɛŋ ka da paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paalʋg ya'a pin'il zug lakir kaŋa ni.
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-no: {{GENDER:|Fʋ}} na paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paalug ya'a pin'il zug lakir nwa ni.
{{GENDER:|Fʋ}} kʋ lɛm paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paal ya'a pin'il zug lakir nwa ni.
discussiontools-notification-added-topic: {{PLURAL:$1|Yɛlzug paal yinne|$1 yɛlzud paal|100=99+ new topics}} on "$2".
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{GENDER:|Fʋ}} tɔn'ɛ pʋ lɛm paam tɛn'sa zaŋi ken {{PLURAL:$1|yɛlzug nwa|yɛlzud bama}}.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Fʋ na nyɛ labaya banɛ ka nidib lɛbisi zaŋi ken pian'azug kaŋa nwa.
Fʋ kʋ lɛn nyɛ labaya yit nidibi lɛbisid si'em zaŋi ken pian'azug nwa nii.
